text: The Democracy Time Party is a political party founded by Mehmet Ali Şenel on 9 May 2016. The short name of the party is DEZA-PAR Democracy Time Party - Supreme Court of the Republic of Turkey Prosecutor's Office == History == The party was first established under the name 'Zaza People's Party'. Later, after receiving the warning that “Region cannot be established on the basis of race,” the Supreme Court of Appeals Prosecutor's Office changed its party name as 'Innovative and Change Party'. In the "Innovative and Change Party" congress held in Ankara on September 1, it was renamed "Time of Democracy Party" according to the change of name. 'Zaza party 'DEZA-PAR is getting ready for the electionsZaza party is coming 'DEZA' in the short name of the party means 'uncle son' (cousin) in Zaza language. Party leader Dilaver Eren stated that 'DEZA' means 'Cousin' in Zaza language and said that they consciously preferred this as a subliminal message.Roşan Hayıg & Brigitte Werner, Zazaca- Türkçe Sözlük-Türkçe-Zazaca Sözcük Listesi, Tîj Yayıncılık, 2012 ==References== ==External links== *Official home page * * :Category:Political parties in Turkey :Category:Zazas
title: Democracy Time Party
